description: This version of the  Boy emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supported platform
apple_vendor_description: The medium skin tone boy on Apple devices is depicted with a bright, curious gaze and a friendly smile, embodying youthful energy and innocence. His features are rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and smooth gradients, giving him a friendly and approachable look. The realistic lighting enhances his lively expression, making this emoji a perfect visual for childhood, playfulness, or any message conveying youthful joy and optimism.
